parameter.name: threshold
parameter.label: Threshold
parameter.description: Triggers ON if value is below threshold.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.description: Scale (non-negative number) to be applied on the state.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.label: Rounding Mode
parameter.description: Rounding mode to be used (e.g. "UP", "DOWN", "CEILING", "FLOOR", "HALF_UP" or "HALF_DOWN").

parameter.name: min
parameter.label: Min Value
parameter.description: Maps to 0% if value is equal to or less than this value (plain number or number with unit).

parameter.name: max
parameter.label: Max Value
parameter.description: Maps to 100% if value is equal to or greater than this value (plain number or number with unit).
